shrimp.name: SHWWood
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Based on Stephen H. Westin's wood shader, from "Measuring and Modeling the Appearance of Finished Wood", SIGGRAPH2005, by Stephen R. Marschner, Stephen H. Westin, Adam Arbree, and Jonathan T. Moon. "Ka", "Kd", are the ambient and diffuse coefficients, and "Ks" is a fudge factor for the surface highlight. "FiberAxis", controls the local fiber orientation in local coordinates. "Beta" controls the width of the specular highlight, in radians. "cfiber" controls the anisotropic highlight color, "cdiff" controls the surface color. "Eta" controls the index of refraction, "roughness" controls the specular roughness. This block passes the resulting values to the "aov_surfacecolor", "aov_ambient", "aov_diffuse" and "aov_specular" AOV presets.
